DOC.brief_summary: We will evaluate the bioavailability of naproxen 500 mg administered as three dfferent formulations.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Bioavailability of Naproxen 500 mg in Three Formulations
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or nonpregnant female subjects between 1855 years of age as well as other standard inclusion criteria for a study of this nature Standard exclusion criteria for a study of this nature
